name: arbor-aed
label: Netscout AED
description: Netscout AED is an inline security appliance deployed at the network perimeter (i.e. between router and firewall) that can automatically detect and block inbound threats (e.g. DDoS attacks, malware) and outbound malicious communication (i.e. C2, bad URLs) using unique, curated, ATLAS threat intelligence.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the server url of the Netscout AED instance.
fields.tooltip: Specify the server url of the Netscout AED instance.

fields.title: API Key
fields.name: api_key
fields.description: Specify the API Key generated in Netscout AED instance.
fields.tooltip: Specify the API Key generated in Netscout AED instance.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Countries
operations.description: Retrieves the Netscout AED country codes and names based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Queue
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘+’ delimited countries name.
parameters.description: Specify the list of ‘+’ delimited country names based on which you want to filter the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Response Fields
parameters.name: select
parameters.placeholder: Eg. country,name or name or country
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited key
parameters.description: Specify the list of ‘+’ delimited keys that you want to in the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Sort
parameters.name: sort_param
parameters.tooltip: Sort the countries retrieved by this operation by a key i.e., either country or name. By default, this is set to name.
parameters.description: Sort the countries retrieved by this operation by a key i.e., either country or name. By default, this is set to name.

parameters.title: Direction
parameters.name: direction
parameters.tooltip: The direction in which results are sorted (ASC or DESC). Note: This parameter can only be used when the "Sort" parameter is specified.
parameters.description: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending. Note: This parameter can only be used when the "Sort" parameter is specified.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say countries starting from the 10th country. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say countries starting from the 10th country. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Records Per Page
parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.
parameters.tooltip: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.description: Other fields that you want to use to filter results returned by this operation. You can find these fields in Endpoints API Documentation on your AED setup.
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Create Inbound Protection Groups
operations.description: Creates an Netscout AED protection group based on the protection group name, IP addresses, protection group server type, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Protection Group Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the protection group name that you want to create in Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Name of the protection group name that you want to create in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: IP Addresses or CIDRs
parameters.name: prefixes
parameters.description: List of ‘,’ delimited IP addresses or CIDRs belonging to the protection group that you want to create in Netscout AED. Note: Any IP Addresses or CIDRs that do not match the IP version of the specified protection group server type will be ignored.
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited IP Addresses or CIDRs belonging to the protection group. Any IP Addresses or CIDRs that do not match the IP version of the server type will be ignored.

parameters.title: Protection Group Server Type
parameters.name: serverType
parameters.description: Server type of the Netscout AED group in which you want to create the protection group.
parameters.tooltip: Server type of the Netscout AED group in which you want to create the protection group.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the protection group name that you want to create in Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Description of the protection group name that you want to create in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Active
parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Select this checkbox to set the mode of the protection group that you want to create in Netscout AED to 'Active'.
parameters.tooltip: Select this checkbox to set the mode of the protection group that you want to create in Netscout AED to 'Active'.

parameters.title: Protection Level
parameters.name: protectionLevel
parameters.description: Protection level that you want to set for the protection group that you want to create in Netscout AED. You can choose from the following options: None = use the global protection level, 1 = Low (default), 2 = Medium, and 3 = High
parameters.tooltip: Protection level that you want to set for the protection group that you want to create in Netscout AED. You can choose from the following options: None = use the global protection level, 1 = Low (default), 2 = Medium, and 3 = High

operations.title: Get Inbound Protection Groups
operations.description: Retrieves all the inbound protection groups or specific inbound protection groups from the Netscout AED protection groups based on the input parameters you have specified.

parameters.title: Protection Group Identifier
parameters.name: pgid
parameters.description: Identifier of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Identifier of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Protection Group Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Name of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Description of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Created Time
parameters.name: timeCreated
parameters.tooltip: Time of the creation of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED.
parameters.description: Time of the creation of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Active
parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Mode, Active or Inactive, of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED. Selecting this option sets the mode of the protection group to 'Active'.
parameters.tooltip: Mode, Active or Inactive, of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED. Selecting this option sets the mode of the protection group to 'Active'.

parameters.title: Protection Level
parameters.name: protectionLevel
parameters.description: Protection level, None, Low, Medium, or High of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Protection level, None, Low, Medium, or High of the protection group that you want to retrieve from Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Sort
parameters.name: sort_param
parameters.tooltip: Key used to sort the protection groups retrieved by this operation.
parameters.description: Key used to sort the protection groups retrieved by this operation.

parameters.title: Direction
parameters.name: direction
parameters.tooltip: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending. Note: This parameter can only be used when the "Sort" parameter is specified.
parameters.description: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending. Note: This parameter can only be used when the "Sort" parameter is specified.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Records Per Page
parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.
parameters.tooltip: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.description: Other fields that you want to use to filter results returned by this operation. You can find these fields in Endpoints API Documentation on your AED setup.
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Update Inbound Protection Groups
operations.description: Modifies the mode or the protection level for specific inbound protection groups based on the protection group IDs you have specified.

parameters.title: Protection Group IDs
parameters.name: pgid
parameters.tooltip: List of protection group IDs that you want to update in Netscout AED.
parameters.description: List of protection group IDs that you want to update in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Active
parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Mode, Active or Inactive, of the protection group that you want to update in Netscout AED. Selecting this option sets the mode of the protection group to 'Active'.
parameters.tooltip: Mode, Active or Inactive, of the protection group that you want to update in Netscout AED. Selecting this option sets the mode of the protection group to 'Active'.

parameters.title: Protection Level
parameters.name: protectionLevel
parameters.description: Protection level that you want to set for the protection group that you want to update in Netscout AED. You can choose from the following options: None = use the global protection level, 1 = Low (default), 2 = Medium, and 3 = High
parameters.tooltip: The protection level (None = use the global protection level, 1 = low, 2 = medium, 3 = high). Default: 1

operations.title: Add Inbound Blacklist Countries
operations.description: Adds one or more countries to the Netscout AED blacklist based on the country codes and protection group IDs (pgid) or central configuration IDs (cid) you have specified.

parameters.title: Country Code
parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO standardized country codes or a comma-separated list of country codes that you want to add to the blacklist in Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: ISO standardized country codes or a comma-separated list of country codes that you want to add to the blacklist in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Select CID or PGID
parameters.name: cid_pgid

Central Configuration ID.title: Central Configuration ID
Central Configuration ID.name: cid
Central Configuration ID.description: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.
Central Configuration ID.tooltip: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.

Protection Group ID.title: Protection Group ID
Protection Group ID.name: pgid
Protection Group ID.description: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.
Protection Group ID.tooltip: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.

parameters.tooltip: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to add the country to the blacklist in Netscout AED.
parameters.description: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to add the country to the blacklist in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Annotation
parameters.name: annotation
parameters.tooltip: Specify a message to associate with each country that you add to the deny list.
parameters.description: Specify a message to associate with each country that you add to the deny list.

operations.title: Get Inbound Blacklisted Countries
operations.description: Retrieves all the inbound blacklisted countries or specific inbound blacklisted countries based on the input parameters you have specified. By default, 10 blacklisted countries are returned. To return blacklisted countries for specific protection groups, specify a list of protection group IDs or central configuration IDs. An ID of -1 selects countries that are globally blacklisted.

parameters.title: Country Code
parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO standardized country codes or a comma-separated list of country codes that you want to retrieve from the inbound blacklist in Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: ISO standardized country codes or a comma-separated list of country codes that you want to retrieve from the inbound blacklist in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Select CID or PGID
parameters.name: cid_pgid

Central Configuration ID.title: Central Configuration ID
Central Configuration ID.name: cid
Central Configuration ID.description: List of ‘,’ delimited central configuration IDs. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.
Central Configuration ID.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited central configuration IDs. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.

Protection Group ID.title: Protection Group ID
Protection Group ID.name: pgid
Protection Group ID.description: List of ‘,’ delimited protection group IDs. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.
Protection Group ID.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited protection group IDs. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.

parameters.tooltip: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to retrieve the countries that are part of the blacklist in Netscout AED.
parameters.description: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to retrieve the countries that are part of the blacklist in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Update Time
parameters.name: updateTime
parameters.description: Last updated or set time for the countries that you want to retrieve from the inbound blacklist in Netscout AED
parameters.tooltip: Last updated or set time for the countries that you want to retrieve from the inbound blacklist in Netscout AED

parameters.title: Queue
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘+’ delimited key values based on which you want to filter the results of this operation.
parameters.description: List of ‘+’ delimited key values based on which you want to filter the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Response Fields
parameters.name: select
parameters.placeholder: Eg. country,updateTime,cid or name or country etc.
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited keys that you want to include in the results of this operation.
parameters.description: List of ‘,’ delimited keys that you want to include in the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Sort
parameters.name: sort_param
parameters.tooltip: Key used to sort the countries retrieved by this operation.
parameters.description: Key used to sort the countries retrieved by this operation.

parameters.title: Direction
parameters.name: direction
parameters.tooltip: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending. By default, this page will be sorted in the 'Ascending' order of country code. Note: This parameter can only be used when the "Sort" parameter is specified.
parameters.description: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending. By default, this page will be sorted in the 'Ascending' order of country code. Note: This parameter can only be used when the "Sort" parameter is specified.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Records Per Page
parameters.name: perPage
parameters.tooltip: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10
parameters.description: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.description: Other fields that you want to use to filter results returned by this operation. You can find these fields in Endpoints API Documentation on your AED setup.
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Add Inbound Blacklist Hosts
operations.description: Adds one or more hosts to the Netscout AED blacklist based on the host addresses or CIDRs and protection group IDs (pgid) or central configuration IDs (cid) you have specified.

operations.title: Remove Inbound Blacklisted Hosts
operations.description: Removes one or more hosts or CIDRs from the Netscout AED blacklist for a specific protection group or for all protection groups based on the host addresses or CIDRs and protection group IDs (pgid) or central configuration IDs (cid) you have specified.

parameters.title: Host Address
parameters.name: hostAddress
parameters.description: A single IPv4 or IPv6 host address or CIDR or a comma-separated list of host addresses or CIDRs that you want to remove from the blacklist in Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: A single IPv4 or IPv6 host address or CIDR or a comma-separated list of host addresses or CIDRs that you want to remove from the blacklist in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Select CID or PGID
parameters.name: cid_pgid

Central Configuration ID.title: Central Configuration ID
Central Configuration ID.name: cid
Central Configuration ID.description: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.
Central Configuration ID.tooltip: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.

Protection Group ID.title: Protection Group ID
Protection Group ID.name: pgid
Protection Group ID.description: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter
Protection Group ID.tooltip: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter

parameters.tooltip: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to remove the hosts from the blacklist in Netscout AED.
parameters.description: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to remove the hosts from the blacklist in Netscout AED.

operations.title: Add Inbound Whitelisted Hosts
operations.description: Adds one or more hosts to the Netscout AED whitelist based on the host addresses or CIDRs and protection group IDs (pgid) or central configuration IDs (cid).

parameters.title: Host Address
parameters.name: hostAddress
parameters.description: A single IPv4 or IPv6 host address or CIDR or a comma-separated list of host addresses or CIDRs that you want to add to the whitelist in Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: A single IPv4 or IPv6 host address or CIDR or a comma-separated list of host addresses or CIDRs that you want to add to the whitelist in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Select CID or PGID
parameters.name: cid_pgid

Central Configuration ID.title: Central Configuration ID
Central Configuration ID.name: cid
Central Configuration ID.tooltip: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.
Central Configuration ID.description: A specific central configuration ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.

Protection Group ID.title: Protection Group ID
Protection Group ID.name: pgid
Protection Group ID.description: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.
Protection Group ID.tooltip: A specific protection group ID or -1 for global. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.

parameters.tooltip: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to add the hosts to the whtelist in Netscout AED.
parameters.description: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to add the hosts to the whtelist in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Annotation
parameters.name: annotation
parameters.tooltip: Specify a description that applies to all the specified hosts or a comma-separated list of descriptions, each of which applies to a specific host.
parameters.description: Specify a description that applies to all the specified hosts or a comma-separated list of descriptions, each of which applies to a specific host.

operations.title: Get Inbound Whitelisted Hosts
operations.description: Retrieves all the inbound whitelisted hosts or specific inbound whitelisted hosts based on the input parameters you have specified. By default, all whitelisted hosts are returned. To return whitelisted hosts for specific protection groups, specify a list of protection group IDs or central configuration IDs. An ID of -1 selects hosts that are globally whitelisted.

parameters.title: Host Address
parameters.name: hostAddress
parameters.description: List of ‘,’ delimited IPv4 host addresses or CIDRs that you want to retrieve from the inbound whitelist in Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited IPv4 host addresses or CIDRs that you want to retrieve from the inbound whitelist in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Select CID or PGID
parameters.name: cid_pgid

Central Configuration ID.title: Central Configuration ID
Central Configuration ID.name: cid
Central Configuration ID.description: List of ‘,’ delimited central configuration IDs. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.
Central Configuration ID.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited central configuration IDs. Cannot be used with the Protection Group ID (pgid) parameter.

Protection Group ID.title: Protection Group ID
Protection Group ID.name: pgid
Protection Group ID.description: List of ‘,’ delimited protection group IDs. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.
Protection Group ID.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited protection group IDs. Cannot be used with the Central Configuration ID (cid) parameter.

parameters.tooltip: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to retrieve the hosts that are part of the whitelist in Netscout AED.
parameters.description: Select Central Configuration ID or Protection Group ID based on which you want to retrieve the hosts that are part of the whitelist in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Update Time
parameters.name: updateTime
parameters.description: Last updated or set time for the hosts that you want to retrieve from the inbound blacklist in Netscout AED.
parameters.tooltip: Last updated or set time for the hosts that you want to retrieve from the inbound blacklist in Netscout AED.

parameters.title: Queue
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘+’ delimited key values based on which you want to filter the results of this operation.
parameters.description: List of ‘+’ delimited key values based on which you want to filter the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Response Fields
parameters.name: select
parameters.tooltip: List of ‘,’ delimited keys that you want to include in the results of this operation.
parameters.description: List of ‘,’ delimited keys that you want to include in the results of this operation.

parameters.title: Sort
parameters.name: sort_param
parameters.tooltip: Key used to sort the domains retrieved by this operation.
parameters.description: Key used to sort the domains retrieved by this operation.

parameters.title: Direction
parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending. Note: This parameter can only be used when the "Sort" parameter is specified.
parameters.tooltip: Direction in which you want to sort the results of this operation. You can choose between Ascending or Descending. Note: This parameter can only be used when the "Sort" parameter is specified.

parameters.title: Page Number
parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records. By default, this is set as 1.

parameters.title: Records Per Page
parameters.name: perPage
parameters.tooltip: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.
parameters.description: Number of results, per page that this operation should return. By default, this is set to 10.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.description: Other fields that you want to use to filter results returned by this operation. You can find these fields in Endpoints API Documentation on your AED setup.
